Title: Stewardess Interruptus
Writer: Tom Kapinos (developed by), Sheri Elwood, Mike Costa (story editor), Chris Rafferty (story editor), Neil Gaiman (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside
Plot: The tension between Lucifer and Chloe makes it difficult for them to investigate the murder of two victims who happen to be Lucifer's old flames.
